intro: Sarcotheca pinnata, commonly known as the featherleaf sarcotella, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and dry landscapes. Due to its ornamental value and unique foliage, Sarcotheca pinnata is often cultivated in botanical gardens and by horticultural enthusiasts.
